properties.entry: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMP_ID, EMP_NAME, EMP_NO, EMAIL, PHONE, DEPT_CODE, JOB_CODE, SAL_LEVEL, SALARY, BONUS, MANAGER_ID, HIRE_DATE, ENT_DATE, ENT_YN) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

SELECT E.EMP_ID, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_NO, E.EMAIL, E.PHONE, E.DEPT_CODE, E.JOB_CODE, E.SAL_LEVEL, E.SALARY, E.BONUS, E.MANAGER_ID, E.HIRE_DATE, E.ENT_DATE, E.ENT_YN, J.JOB_NAME, D.DEPT_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN JOB J ON E.JOB_CODE=J.JOB_CODE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE=D.DEPT_ID WHERE EMP_ID = ?
UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET EMAIL = ? , DEPT_CODE = ? , SALARY = ? , BONUS = ? WHERE EMP_ID = ?
